question: The Ephemeral plants are those plants which __:
option1: are capable of tolerating saline conditions
option2: are adapted to seasonal or perennial drought
option3: derive water and nutrients from air
option4: complete their cycle in very short period
answer: complete their cycle in very short period
explanation: Ephemeral plants Ephemeral plants are those plants that are born only after occasional rains and reproduce and die before a new drought comes. They generally have a very short life cycle.
